page.title: 16Hambro Nurseries,Rawreth.
page.content: There are three acres of glasshouses with gas fired underfloor heating and automatic sprinklers.A computer copes with environmental conditions and regulates temperature and irrigation. Windows are automatic.Currently,the nursery is changing from wood framed to aluminium framed windows.There are two taps in each greenhouse,one for water and one for water plus fertiliser.Pot plants,bedding plants, perennials and vegetables are grown. Marigolds are the most popular plants. Machinery includes a sowing machine to sow seeds;a soil mixer to mix sterile soil with peat and grit;a machine to fill trays and pots with soil and a labelling machine.Ten people are employed.Two women had potted up 5000 plants between them on the day we visited.
